generated_body: In the article titled "Air Quality Index: What to do when the air quality is bad in your area," the user can expect a comprehensive overview of the Air Quality Index (AQI) and its implications for health and safety. It may outline the various levels of air quality, detailing what specific AQI readings indicate regarding pollution levels and associated health risks. Additionally, the article is likely to provide practical advice on actions to take when air quality is poor, such as staying indoors, using air purifiers, or wearing masks. This information could help the reader understand how to protect themselves and their families during times of environmental concern.
